text: Emil Doepler the younger (29 October 1855 â€“ 21 December 1922) was an illustrator, painter and teacher. Today he is seen as one of the people who influenced the Art Nouveau movement. Emil Doepler's father was Carl Emil Doepler. Doepler designed the coat of arms of the Weimar Republic. ==Related pages== *List of German painters Category:1855 births Category:1922 deaths Category:German painters Category:German illustrators
title: Emil Doepler
